snippet: Richard M. Schulze, who founded the company with a single audio equipment store in 1966, announced a proposal on Monday that would give the company a market value of $8.8 billion.
abstract: Richard M. Schulze, who founded the company with a single audio equipment store in 1966, announced a proposal on Monday that would give the company a market value of $8.8 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and STEPHANIE CLIFFORD

headline.main: Best Buy Founder Makes Bid for a Takeover
headline.print_headline: Best Buy Founder Makes Bid for a Takeover
